items.name: start.gg Affiliation
items.description: Encourage players to register with Nouns custom tag

description:
Nouns Esports, an established esports organization, aims to expand its reach into the world of fighting games by sponsoring a group of 30-40 fighting game players to attend EVO, the world's largest fighting game tournament taking place from Aug 4th to the 6th, 2023. The organization is requesting 36,000 USDC to cover the sponsorship expenses.

Their plan includes providing Nouns-branded apparel, organizing a team-building/social event during EVO, planned media coverage, and affiliating with start.gg by using a custom tag. The proposed funding plan allocates approximately 75% of the budget for player funding (300 USDC for North American players and 800 USDC for international players), 10% for the social event (potentially in collaboration with PizzaDAO), and 15% for operational management and support.

EVO is chosen as it is a massive event with thousands of participants and millions of viewers globally, offering an excellent opportunity to showcase the Nouns Esports brand and values to a new community. The organization aims to sponsor players based on their skill and needs, providing financial support to talented players who might not have the opportunity otherwise. Successful sponsorship could lead to positive PR and brand exposure.

The Nouns Esports team consists of several members, and they plan to use the existing multisig for financial operations.

In conclusion, Nouns Esports is eager to make a significant impact in the fighting game esports scene, building a strong relationship with the community and promoting their Nounish values to both players and viewers alike.

project.name: Nouns Esports
project.description: Expanding Nouns Esports into the world of fighting games.

title: Establish Nouns FGC (Fighting Game Community) at EVO 2023
